Items.Script: Our hero decided to turn right and moved on the clearly visible path further.
Turning a little, it noticed something unusual a little at a distance and hurried there.

A cart with logs, felled trees and an ax in the stump made it clear to him - this is a favorite place for lumberjacks. There was no one nearby, and therefore the Robot decided to help them in their difficult work. In the end, it was created to help others.
